20110127035107.000|20110127035109.000|CC1|THE TOP HALF IS FITTED, THE     
20110127035109.000|20110127035110.000|CC1|BOTTOM IS A TENT.               
20110127035110.000|20110127035112.000|CC1|HALF IS STRAPLESS.              
20110127035112.000|20110127035116.000|CC1|HALF IS SLEEVED.                
20110127035116.000|20110127035121.000|CC1|AN THEN YOU HAVE THESE          
20110127035121.000|20110127035123.000|CC1|HEIROGLYPHS THAT MAKE IT        
20110127035123.000|20110127035126.000|CC1|EXTREMELY CONFUSING.            
20110127035126.000|20110127035126.000|CC1|>> NUMBER SEVEN, WHOO-HOO       
20110127035126.000|20110127035127.000|CC1|WHOOPI.                         
20110127035127.000|20110127035127.000|CC1|AND WE DON'T MEAN IT IN A GOOD  
20110127035127.000|20110127035131.000|CC1|WAY.                            
20110127035131.000|20110127035132.000|CC1|>> GOLDBERG DECIDED TO PLAY PEEK
20110127035132.000|20110127035133.000|CC1|A BOO IN THIS PURPLE SATIN FROCK
20110127035133.000|20110127035134.000|CC1|WHICH OPENED TO REVEAL A GREEN  
20110127035134.000|20110127035134.000|CC1|LINING AND SLIM BROCADE
